item.title: 人生湘潭，板级硬件or芯片测试两份工作怎么选[0-50]
item.description:
人生湘潭，板级硬件or芯片测试两份工作怎么选 自己情况是16年双非本科毕业，死宅单身，服务器主板信号电源测试做了三年，去年才来上海在某外包干了半年又找工作了，找到一家ODM继续做板级DCDC电源设计，轻车熟路；现在面试的上海AMD的Processor silicon validation职位快下offer了，其实这个职位也是在51job瞎投的，和我想的不一样，从测主板到测芯片，面试几十分钟听下来也不大清楚以后发展咋样，就感觉AMD挺牛逼的。AMD的package大概比代工厂高20%，但其实一年也没多多少。
考虑到在上海买不起房以后可能去别的城市，芯片测试找工作感觉基本都在北上广，做电源的话靠熟人也比较好换工作。求个熟悉的EE大佬介绍下AMD或者芯片测试这行，万分感谢！
附上AMD职位JD：
1) Provides PMM technical leadership in the development of new test & validation features2) Closely interacts with feature architect, silicon design and PMM FET(Feature Enablement Team) lead in test execution & debug, as well as in feature definition for future product generation
3) Writes comprehensive electrical & functional test plans for the PMM validation of processors
4) Executes electrical & functional test plans for AMD processors using hardware & software validation tools, oscilloscopes.
5) Debug of electrical & functional PMM issues of processors
6) Provides detailed input into the platform definition & review of platform designs used in the silicon validation of new processors.
7) Provides technical guidance and training to less experienced engineers and technicians in the planning, test, & debug of the PMM portion.
